summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5615 for the improvement of 37th Avenue Northeast, from East 55th Street to East 65th Street, and certain parts of certain other street and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 74005, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
